name: ARE YA WINNING, SON?
description:
DO YOU WANNA WIN, SON? YOU CAN'T

The A.I. of this game has taken over and the game is OUT OF your CONTROL and he challenges that he won't let you win.

 Prove him wrong. 

Controls (theme?) : W S A D 

"The game is completely random, so every time you play, it might be a different experience"

-Devs (Me and Shreyansh Darshan)

'Made in 48 hours for gmtk game jam 2020'
